questionHeader: Select 2 out of 6 actions of the hotel that have the most negative environmental or ethical impact for the community

alternatives.alternativeText: a) The hotel throws away all cups after these types of events
b) The hotel uses multiple suppliers
c) The hotel has overtime work without extra pay
d) The hotel uses aluminium kettles to cook food
e) The hotel offers training possibilities for the staff
f)  The hotel serves dishes with crickets
